title: Ursa Major’s National Parks Soap Bundle
content:
It’s not every day a common thing like soap piques our interest but our friends at Ursa Major have a new pack of soaps that benefit the National Parks Conservation Association with three scents: Zion, Redwood, and Acadia. Each soap uses scents and ingredients that transport you to each of those three National Parks. Showering with the Zion bar creates a red-tinted foam that makes it look like you’re washing off Utah’s iconic red soil. The Redwood smells like Avenue of the Giants and Acadia smells of ocean air caressing the highest point of the Eastern Seaboard…

You can buy each of these soaps or all three now at Ursa Major.
author: prolly
